name: termdock
description: Cross-platform SSH + SFTP desktop client for developers and operators.

scripts.dev: concurrently -k "pnpm run dev:renderer" "pnpm run dev:main" "pnpm run dev:electron"
scripts.dev:electron: wait-on http://localhost:5273 file:dist-electron/main/main.js file:dist-electron/main/preload.cjs && node scripts/run-electron-dev.mjs
scripts.build: pnpm run build:renderer && pnpm run build:main
scripts.dist:mac: pnpm run build && cross-env ELECTRON_BUILDER_BINARIES_MIRROR=https://github.com/electron-userland/electron-builder-binaries/releases/download/ electron-builder --mac dmg zip --publish never
scripts.dist:mac:arm64: pnpm run build && cross-env ELECTRON_BUILDER_BINARIES_MIRROR=https://github.com/electron-userland/electron-builder-binaries/releases/download/ electron-builder --mac dmg zip --arm64 --publish never
scripts.dist:mac:x64: pnpm run build && cross-env ELECTRON_BUILDER_BINARIES_MIRROR=https://github.com/electron-userland/electron-builder-binaries/releases/download/ electron-builder --mac dmg zip --x64 --publish never
scripts.dist:win: pnpm run build && cross-env ELECTRON_BUILDER_BINARIES_MIRROR=https://github.com/electron-userland/electron-builder-binaries/releases/download/ electron-builder --win nsis zip --publish never
scripts.release:mac: pnpm run build && cross-env ELECTRON_BUILDER_BINARIES_MIRROR=https://github.com/electron-userland/electron-builder-binaries/releases/download/ electron-builder --mac dmg zip -p always
scripts.release:win: pnpm run build && cross-env ELECTRON_BUILDER_BINARIES_MIRROR=https://github.com/electron-userland/electron-builder-binaries/releases/download/ electron-builder --win nsis zip -p always

author: TermDock
